name: Ice Block Climber
description:
Shoot out ice platforms in order to continue climbing! The ice platforms will melt over time so block the sun by creating clouds in order to climb as high as possible! Once you fall off the bottom then the game will end.

Controls

  • A & D / Left Stick - Move Left/Right
  • W / Up Left Stick - Jump
  • Left Mouse / Button West - Ice Shot
    • Perform while in the air and holding S / Left Stick Down in order to spawn the platform under you.
  • Right Mouse / Button East - Cloud Shot
